attributes.action: help travellers/gypsy's we need more sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my family are all travellers the only site in my town the council is trying to shut down and wont let any other travellers move onto the site people moan that us travellers get in the way etc... but there aren't enough sites for them to move on and the ones that do get opened usually get closed back down i live in a house as i have no choice if i move into a caravan or mobile home then there isn't anywhere to park it however my family members cant get houses big enough for there families so they have to live in mobile homes but have no where to go i think more sites should be opened or land should be made available to buy so that they can live on there own land if you put all the gypsy's and travellers in houses it would take a lot more room than to provide them some land
